1/* mpz_kronecker_ui -- mpz+ulong Kronecker/Jacobi symbol.

29see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
30
31#include "gmp.h"
32#include "gmp-impl.h"
33#include "longlong.h"
34
35
36int
37mpz_kronecker_ui (mpz_srcptr a, unsigned long b)
38{
39 mp_srcptr a_ptr;
40 mp_size_t a_size;
41 mp_limb_t a_rem;
42 int result_bit1;
43
44 a_size = SIZ(a);
45 if (a_size == 0)
46 return JACOBI_0U (b);
47
48 if (b > GMP_NUMB_MAX)
49 {
50 mp_limb_t blimbs[2];
51 mpz_t bz;
52 ALLOC(bz) = numberof (blimbs);
53 PTR(bz) = blimbs;
54 mpz_set_ui (bz, b);
55 return mpz_kronecker (a, bz);
56 }
57
58 a_ptr = PTR(a);
59 if ((b & 1) != 0)
60 {
61 result_bit1 = JACOBI_ASGN_SU_BIT1 (a_size, b);
62 }
63 else
64 {
65 mp_limb_t a_low = a_ptr[0];
66 int twos;
67
68 if (b == 0)
69 return JACOBI_LS0 (a_low, a_size); /* (a/0) */
70
71 if (! (a_low & 1))
72 return 0; /* (even/even)=0 */
73
74 /* (a/2)=(2/a) for a odd */
75 count_trailing_zeros (twos, b);
76 b >>= twos;
77 result_bit1 = (JACOBI_TWOS_U_BIT1 (twos, a_low)
78 ^ JACOBI_ASGN_SU_BIT1 (a_size, b));
79 }
80
81 if (b == 1)
82 return JACOBI_BIT1_TO_PN (result_bit1); /* (a/1)=1 for any a */
83
84 a_size = ABS(a_size);
85
86 /* (a/b) = (a mod b / b) */
87 JACOBI_MOD_OR_MODEXACT_1_ODD (result_bit1, a_rem, a_ptr, a_size, b);
88 return mpn_jacobi_base (a_rem, (mp_limb_t) b, result_bit1);
89}
90
